mapper.update: update sf_order_operation_log set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sf_order_id = #{sfOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sf_order_status = #{sfOrderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, create_man, sf_order_id, sf_order_status, remark from sf_order_operation_log
